name: Completely Legal Creature Massacre
description:
Buy creatures and make them fight in the pit for your wicked pleasure.
Train them, kill them, merge them. Become the very best and win a trip to the Bahamars!

Made for the Global Game Jam 2018 in Strasbourg by:

Nicolas Gauthier
Pierre Frick
Thomas Frick
Bruno de Chazelles
Yannis Naamane
Eléa Héberlé
Timothée Lestradet
Victor Nardin
Robin Dussart
Dimitri Guindet
Elisée Maurer

with Superpowers http://superpowers-html5.com/
